title: Primary Summary Container
reference-overview: The Primary Summary Container is meant to provide the user with a high level overview of various subsections of data. For example, a user could have a number of tasks which could be broken down into a set of statuses. The primary summary container would provide the number of total tasks broken down into the various status states.
reference-usage:
• Number of sub-sections can be a variable
  • Each section should be same size
  • Titles can wrap to second link
  • Each section has rollover color
  • Red to indicate Attention Needed
  • Yellow is rollover color
  • Each subsection can be a link to more details or just a number
